data.text: @MassMECFS I am sure this will be great but one question..Why is the guest speaker not a post infectious disease specialist rather than a psychologist?

@MassMECFS If you can't attend the webinar, get a copy sent to you immediately afterward by clicking this link - https://t.co/lot7LKuo84. Click Record at the bottom of the page to get the recording started.
@MassMECFS This is so important, I registered, hope you will too.
